issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

comments.body:
Michel, Would you mind providing a full test case that shows this issue. One that may be pasted into an app.js and reproduces this issue? Once I can reproduce and verify then I can pass along to Engineering. Thank you,
Carter
